languages.text: Снаряжение, в котором заключен истощенный злобный дух варпа. В высокоразвитом иррадиальном когитаторе заперт измученный голодом демон. Батареи его вечно почти пусты, и дух жадно пожирает любую тепловую энергию из окружающей среды, кроме тепла тела своего хозяина.

Equipment containing a weakened malicious warp spirit. A starved daemon is locked inside the highly advanced iridial cogitator. Its batteries perpetually near-empty, the spirit will ravenously devour any thermal energy from its surroundings save for its owner's body heat.
languages.original_text: Снаряжение, в котором заключен истощенный злобный дух варпа. В высокоразвитом иррадиальном когитаторе заперт измученный голодом демон. Батареи его вечно почти пусты, и дух жадно пожирает любую тепловую энергию из окружающей среды, кроме тепла тела своего хозяина.

traits.locale_text: Equipment that contains a weakened malicious warp spirit. A starved demon is locked inside the highly advanced irradial cogitator. Its batteries perpetually near-empty, the spirit will ravenously devour any thermal energy from its surroundings save for its owner's body heat.

Equipment containing a weakened malicious warp spirit. A starved daemon is locked inside the highly advanced iridial cogitator. Its batteries perpetually near-empty, the spirit will ravenously devour any thermal energy from its surroundings save for its owner's body heat.

languages.text: Equipo que contiene un espíritu maligno de la disformidad debilitado. El cogitador iridial avanzado encierra a un daemon hambriento. Sus baterías siempre están casi vacías, así que el espíritu devorará cualquier energía térmica cercana excepto el calor corporal de su portador.
languages.original_text: Equipment containing a weakened malicious warp spirit. A starved daemon is locked inside the highly advanced iridial cogitator. Its batteries perpetually near-empty, the spirit will ravenously devour any thermal energy from its surroundings save for its owner's body heat.

traits.locale_text: Equipo que contiene un espíritu maligno de la disformidad debilitado. El cogitador iridial avanzado encierra a un daemon hambriento. Sus baterías siempre están casi vacías, así que el espíritu devorará cualquier energía térmica cercana excepto el calor corporal de su portador.

languages.text: Un objet contenant un esprit du Warp maléfique dans un état affaibli. Son cogitateur iridien hautement sophistiqué renferme un démon affamé. Pour pallier ses batteries perpétuellement proches de l'épuisement, l'esprit dévore avidement toute forme d'énergie thermique passant à sa portée, à l'exception de la chaleur corporelle de son détenteur.
languages.original_text: Equipment containing a weakened malicious warp spirit. A starved daemon is locked inside the highly advanced iridial cogitator. Its batteries perpetually near-empty, the spirit will ravenously devour any thermal energy from its surroundings save for its owner's body heat.

traits.locale_text: Un objet contenant un esprit du Warp maléfique dans un état affaibli. Son cogitateur iridien hautement sophistiqué renferme un démon affamé. Pour pallier ses batteries perpétuellement proches de l'épuisement, l'esprit dévore avidement toute forme d'énergie thermique passant à sa portée, à l'exception de la chaleur corporelle de son détenteur.

languages.text: 这件设备中禁锢着一只虚弱的亚空间恶灵。这只饥肠辘辘的恶魔被锁闭在高科技虹膜沉思者内，电池长期处于濒临耗尽的状态，它将饥不择食地吞噬周围的一切热能，除了主人的体温。
languages.original_text: Equipment containing a weakened malicious warp spirit. A starved daemon is locked inside the highly advanced iridial cogitator. Its batteries perpetually near-empty, the spirit will ravenously devour any thermal energy from its surroundings save for its owner's body heat.

traits.locale_text: 这件设备中禁锢着一只虚弱的亚空间恶灵。这只饥肠辘辘的恶魔被锁闭在高科技虹膜思考器内，电池长期处于濒临耗尽的状态，它将饥不择食地吞噬周围的一切热能，除了主人的体温。

languages.text: 弱った、悪意ある<歪み>の精霊が封じ込められた装置。高度な虹彩型考算機の中に、飢えたディーモンが閉じ込められている。そのバッテリーは常に空に近く、精霊は持ち主の体温を除く、周囲の熱エネルギーを貪欲に貪る。
languages.original_text: Equipment containing a weakened malicious warp spirit. A starved daemon is locked inside the highly advanced iridial cogitator. Its batteries perpetually near-empty, the spirit will ravenously devour any thermal energy from its surroundings save for its owner's body heat.

traits.locale_text: 弱った、悪意ある<歪み>の精霊が封じ込められた装置。高度な虹彩型考算機の中に、飢えたディーモンが閉じ込められている。そのバッテリーは常に空に近く、精霊は持ち主の体温を除く、周囲の熱エネルギーを貪欲に貪る。

languages.text: Ausrüstung, die einen geschwächten, bösartigen Warpgeist enthält. Ein ausgehungerter Dämon ist in den hochmodernen iridialen Cogitator eingeschlossen. Seine Batterien sind dauerhaft fast leer, weshalb der Geist gierig sämtliche thermale Energie aus seiner Umgebung verschlingt, mit Ausnahme der Körperwärme des Trägers.
languages.original_text: Equipment containing a weakened malicious warp spirit. A starved daemon is locked inside the highly advanced iridial cogitator. Its batteries perpetually near-empty, the spirit will ravenously devour any thermal energy from its surroundings save for its owner's body heat.

traits.locale_text: Ausrüstung, die einen geschwächten, bösartigen Warpgeist enthält. Ein ausgehungerter Dämon ist in den hochmodernen iridialen Cogitator eingeschlossen. Seine Batterien sind dauerhaft fast leer, weshalb der Geist gierig sämtliche thermale Energie aus seiner Umgebung verschlingt, mit Ausnahme der Körperwärme des Trägers.

languages.text: İçerisinde zayıf düşürülmüş şeytani bir öteboyut ruhu barındıran ekipman. Aç bir iblis, son derece gelişmiş bir ışınımsal kavramsayarın içine hapsedilmiştir. Bataryalar sürekli boşa yakın durumda olduğu için ruh, sahibinin vücut ısısı dışında çevresindeki her türlü termal enerjiyi aç gözlülükle tüketir.
languages.original_text: Equipment containing a weakened malicious warp spirit. A starved daemon is locked inside the highly advanced iridial cogitator. Its batteries perpetually near-empty, the spirit will ravenously devour any thermal energy from its surroundings save for its owner's body heat.
